items.name: Narcissist
items.description: Smells like Peachwood, Notes of Peaches, Raspberries, & Patchouli Sandalwood. Ingredients: Sodium Cocoate (from Coconut Oil), Sodium Palmate (from Palm Oil), Sodium Rapeseedate (from Rapeseed Oil), Fragrance, Sodium Olivate (from Olive Oil), Mica.

items.name: Good Morning Sunshine
items.description: Smells like Citrus & Sunrise, Notes of: Grapefruit, Champagne, Orange, Lemon, & Lime, Ingredients: Sodium Cocoate (from Coconut Oil), Sodium Palmate (from Palm Oil), Sodium Rapeseedate (from Rapeseed Oil), Fragrance, Sodium Olivate (from Olive Oil), Mica.

items.name: Island Nectar
items.description: Smells like Passionfruit & Ocean Breeze, Notes of: Passionfruit, Jasmine, Citrus, & Exotic Florals, Ingredients: Sodium Cocoate (from Coconut Oil), Sodium Palmate (from Palm Oil), Sodium Rapeseedate (from Rapeseed Oil), Fragrance, Sodium Olivate (from Olive Oil), Mica.

items.name: Ferocious
items.description: Smells like: Cedarwood & Campfire Beers, Notes of: Citrus, Lavender, White Musk, Cedarwood, & Amber, Ingredients: Sodium Cocoate (from Coconut Oil), Sodium Palmate (from Palm Oil), Sodium Rapeseedate (from Rapeseed Oil), Fragrance, Sodium Olivate (from Olive Oil), Mica.

items.name: Shea
items.description: Smells like: Peachwood & Me Time, Notes of: Peaches, Raspberries, & Patchouli Sandalwood, Ingredients: Sodium Cocoate (from Coconut Oil), Sodium Palmate (from Palm Oil), Sodium Rapeseedate (from Rapeseed Oil), Fragrance, Sodium Olivate (from Olive Oil), Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Butter, Mica.

items.name: Magnolia
items.description: Smells like: Flowers & Rocking Chairs, Notes of: Magnolia Flower, Apple, Blackberry, & Melon, Ingredients: Sodium Cocoate (from Coconut Oil), Sodium Palmate (from Palm Oil), Sodium Rapeseedate (from Rapeseed Oil), Fragrance, Sodium Olivate (from Olive Oil), Mica.

items.name: Love Potion
items.description: Smells like: Roses & Young Love, Notes of: Damask Rose, Peach, Apple Blossom, & Italian Bergamot, Ingredients: Sodium Cocoate (from Coconut Oil), Sodium Palmate (from Palm Oil), Sodium Rapeseedate (from Rapeseed Oil), Fragrance, Sodium Olivate (from Olive Oil), Mica.

items.name: Coconut
items.description: Smells like: Coconut & Pina Coladas, Notes of: Coconut, Vanilla, Milk, & Cream, Ingredients: Sodium Cocoate (from Coconut Oil), Sodium Palmate (from Palm Oil), Sodium Rapeseedate (from Rapeseed Oil), Fragrance, Sodium Olivate (from Olive Oil), Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Butter, Mica.
